title: Update your account...
body:
Firstly, I am not happy with this whole idea of renaming accounts. Using e-mail address instead of user name, like Blizzard did, would be much much better than forcing majority to change their desired names entirely.

Secondly, when I press the red button in League client my default browser is opened and web page is blank and indefinitely loading. Web page address isn't even appear in address bar so I can't copy-paste it in different browser.

As far as I've heard there were supposed to be e-mails sent with the instructions on how to change (or not change) your user name in advance. The last mail I got was advertisement "reclaim your spot at the top of the charts with True Damage Senna" from 2 weeks ago and no any instructions, not even in spam folder.

replies.body: You only have to change your UN if it exists elsewhere. Since Riot accounts are global (LoL accoutns are regional), this means if you have an account on a different region with the same UN you will have to change *it* before you can set that UN for your OCE account.
Use firefox to open link. Solved the issue for me!! Hope it helped!!
